= Introduction =

There are several options to get and install the grails-jaxrs plugin

  * From the Grails plugin repository (recommended if you want to use the latest stable release)
  * From the project's download area and separate installation (recommended if you want to use milestone releases)
  * From the projects sources (recommended if you want to experiment with the latest development snapshots)
